mapper.insert: insert into project(project_num, creator_num, category_num, project_sub, project_goal, project_comment, project_detail, project_price, project_level, project_thumbnail) values(seq_proj_num.nextval, #{creator_num}, #{category_num}, #{project_sub}, #{project_goal},#{project_comment}, #{project_detail}, #{project_price}, #{project_level}, #{project_thumbnail})
